name: CoresyfVectorCreator
description: Tool that uses the GDAL OGR module to create shapefiles. Only the point geometry is supported

inputs.name: source
inputs.description: Delimited text file with data fields separated by tab character

parameters.name: input_crs
parameters.description: Spatial reference system EPSG code of the coordinates in the source data_file, some possible codes are: EPSG codes are '4326', '3857'  (default: '4326')

parameters.name: output_format
parameters.description: GDAL vector format for output file, some possible formats are:  'ESRI Shapefile', 'netCDF'  (default: 'ESRI Shapefile')

parameters.name: output_crs
parameters.description: Spatial reference system EPSG code of the output vector, some possible codes are: EPSG codes are '4326', '3857'  (default: '4326')

outputs.name: target
outputs.description: Output vector file to be created (default: 'output_vector.shp')
